com.example.noteation.fragments

Class NotesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.noteation.fragments.NotesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class NotesFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    This class is in charge of showing the notes in a list and allowing the user to create a new note

      • onNoteClicked

        public void onNoteClicked(Note note,
                          int position)
        When a note is clicked, it sends the user to view the note
        Parameters:
        note - The clicked note
        position - The position of the note in the RecyclerView

      • getNotes

        public void getNotes(int requestCode,
                     int noteId)
        Shows, adds, updates or deletes notes in the recyclerView depending on the "requestCode" param
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The type of action for the RecyclerView (showing, adding, updating, deleting)
        noteId - The id of the note

      • showFilterNotesDialog

        private void showFilterNotesDialog()
        Shows a dialog to allow the user to sort the notes by color. It's also in charge of all the "onCheckedListeners" of the checkboxes

      • initCheckBoxes

        private void initCheckBoxes(android.view.View view)
        Initiates all of the checkboxes and sets an "onCheckedChangesListeners" to all of them in order to check which option the user checked (what colors were filtered)
        Parameters:
        view - The dialog's view

      • setImageFilter

        private void setImageFilter(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors)
        Changes the "imageFilterNotes" icon to the filter icon if the user has activated any filters, if the user didn't activate any filters, it sets the icon to the off filter icon
        Parameters:
        colors - The array of colors filtered by the user
